name: Survive the Void (TheOceanMan)
description:
You have encountered the Void! Unfortunately, the Void is nigh impossible to fight as you are now subjected to dodge his bullets for his entertainment...

This is my first game made in the Unity game engine as a way of learning the game development process. Of course, this game is super tiny, and has been in the works for months while I was dealing with other important affairs in life. Either way, enjoy the microgame and expect some more in the future.

If you want to know more, check my blog post about this: https://hacktothefuture.xyz/washing-up-from-the-ocean-of-life-and-game-developme...

All* assets are made by me. At the time of this writing I will provide a blog post.

*Except for the font. That one is by Typefactoryco
